images.copyright: Chimney Rock and Uncompahgre National Forest, Colorado, USA (© Cory Marshall/Tandem Stills + Motion)
images.title: Sweeping views of autumn colour
images.caption: Sweeping views of autumn colour
images.desc: Welcome to the Uncompahgre Forest, in the shadow of Chimney Rock, the perfect place to see autumn colours in the US state of Colorado. Chimney Rock and its neighbour, Courthouse Mountain, dominate the landscape here all year round but the area becomes even more scenic at this time of year.
